PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-02222011-02-10,  ,  HC,  ,  , 
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Medical Devices Regulations (1592 — Canada's Access to Medicines Regime)
PrecisRegulations Amending the MEDICAL DEVICES REGULATIONS (1592 - Canada's Access to Medicines Regime), to clarify that sections 43.3 to 43.6 are in place to enable the implementation of the General Council Decision, as requested by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0042 Publication Date: 2011-03-02
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Medical Devices Regulations (1592 — Canada's Access to Medicines Regime)
